title: Replace visible SMART JANGHAI name text with the logo image

requirements.text: Replace the visible "SMART JANGHAI" brand-name text used for branding on the site with the existing logo image asset, so the logo image is used as the primary branding mark instead of the text.

quotes: REPLACE SMART JANGHAI NAME WITH THIS IMAGE FORMATE LOGO

acceptanceCriteria: The homepage hero continues to display the logo image (not a "SMART JANGHAI" text heading) as the primary brand mark.
The footer branding area no longer renders "SMART JANGHAI" as a visible text heading and displays the logo image instead.
The logo image used for branding is the existing static asset referenced by the app (LOGO_IMAGE = "/assets/generated/logo.png").
Branding remains responsive and readable on mobile/tablet/desktop (logo scales appropriately and does not overflow).

requirements.text: Ensure there is only one visible branding logo mark in the hero/branding area at a time and that missing logo assets never cause a blank section or blank page (use the existing resilient image loading pattern).

quotes: REPLACE SMART JANGHAI NAME WITH THIS IMAGE FORMATE LOGO

acceptanceCriteria: Only one logo image is visible in the hero branding area (no duplicate logos).
If the logo image fails to load, the page still renders without runtime errors and without a blank screen (graceful fallback behavior is preserved).

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only).
Do not modify immutable hook/entry files: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx.
Keep image assets served from frontend/public/assets/generated and referenced by exact filename paths (no backend image routing).
nonGoals: Creating or generating a new logo image file.
Changing backend (Motoko) code or adding backend endpoints.
Adding authentication or any new interactive features beyond the branding swap.
